tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was an great experience. I'm totally satisfied n very happy. I had sensitivity prblm n gaps between my teeth both the problems r totally gone, now I'm having a complete new look. I'm loving it .there's no sensitivity now. In addition to these what I love is the homely atmosphere which I got from Dr Malini Bhattacharya. A very down to earth person. Thanks ma'am.

Firstly,location of the clinic from my house.Secondly, Doctor is very calm and skilled in her performance.
Thirdly, confidence of the doctor.lastly, ambience of the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Dental Fillings,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Checkup (General),
review: I visited the dentist‚Äôs office after about 10 years absolutely nervous not knowing what to expect. I was then introduced to Dr Malini Roy Bhattacharya. Honestly my first impression was ‚Äúshe‚Äôs so young, will she know what to do?‚Äù.  But there‚Äôs something about her that you just trust from the very first instance. She understood my problem, consulted with me on what kind of treatments she recommends and how long they will take, she even gave me alternative suggestions. I am extremely satisfied with my treatment. I have to point out here, on the day of my tooth extraction, I was ready to feel the pain. But to my surprise, I only had to take half a pain killer after the extraction as a precaution, post that - nothing! She‚Äôs a perfectionist and that‚Äôs a good thing in the line of a dentist. She‚Äôs young, charismatic, ********* ************* and most importantly, an amazing human being. She and her staff will make you feel right at home from your very first visit. They are practically family now. I highly recommend her for any dental work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Myself and my wife visited Impladenzz Clinic for a Root Canal Treatment and here are what we inferred thereafter - 

1. The behaviour of Dr Malini is very nice, soft and friendly
2. The ambience of the clinic is very good and they are maintaining strict hygene in this Covid scenario.
3. The equipments are modern and treatment procedure is awesome.
4. Both Dr Malini and her husband Dr Shiv are punctual and maintain the timings strictly.
5. Dr Malini is very efficient in handling all the issues, diagnosing them and also in treatment.

We would recommend Dr Malini to everyone.

context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
*** ****** ** ** ********* ******* ******* **** **** I am taking treatment for last 8 years for my varied dental problems. She listens to your problem minutely and after through examination she charts out the plan for the necessary treatment along with timelines. 

I have done three RCT‚Äôs with her and till date I haven‚Äôt faced any problems. Her chamber is well equipped with all modern amenities. Most important point which I like to highlight is that she takes highest care for the patient so that he/she faces no pain during the course of the treatment. 

I would highly recommend her for all your dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Bhattacharya is very helpful and has explained with utmost clarity about the dental issues which need immediate attention. The medical advice which she gave, is easy to follow and I have scheduled a follow up for the same. 
Thank you again.
Oyndrila

Visited impladenzz multispeciality dental clinic with toothache Dr MALINI BHATTACHARYA was my attending doctor she was very gentle and caring understood my problems and gave me medicines explained about root canal treatment.. Very nice experience overall

Came to Dr MALINI BHATTACHARYA for scaling polishing she did an excellent job and did whitening to whiten my tooth. Am extremely satisfied and would visit her always for my dental problem.. The clinic is extremely well organised and the staff are well mannered.. I'll recommend all my friends..

I had consulted a dentist previously who recommended extraction will be the only solution for my problem, then I thought of taking a second opinion and went to Dr Malini Bhattacharya who recommended splinting for my tooth after scaling splinting was done and now I can bite anything which I was unable to do previously and I thank Dr Malini for fixing my problem. It has been 2months the tooth is fine.
reply_text: Thanks Mr Moitra for your feedback.
